title: Award-Winning Fiji Private Island Villas with Golf Course & Spa
description: Immerse yourself in the awe-inspiring beauty of VOMO Island Fiji - a five-star oasis set on its own private island in the pristine Mamanuca archipelago, offering the perfect setting for outdoor adventures or moments of repose. Sit back and relax, knowing the freshest local produce awaits at the resort's fine dining restaurants. Savour international flavours at Reef Restaurant, or try Asian-inspired delights at the adults-only Rock Restaurant. Spend your days adventuring out on mountain treks, windsurfing and scuba diving, then find bliss at the tranquil Kui Spa or simply relax poolside with a cocktail. Whatever kind of escape you seek, this slice of tropical paradise is sure to refresh you, body and soul.
offer_address: PO. Box 5650 Lautoka, Vomo Island, Mamanuca Islands, Fiji
